div.l: And þus wᵗith hordam and briberie
Togeder þei vsed tyl hanged hye
For who so euel byeth shal make a sory sale
And þus I make an ende of my tale
a ꝓproloug
Oure ost seed wel þᵗat þᵉ bryth sonne
Þᵉ ark of his artificial day hath ronne
Al þauh he were not þᵉ deppest tauht īn lore
Þᵉ ferthe part ⁊and half an houre ⁊and more
He wyst hit was þᵉ xviii day
Of apⁱrile þᵗat is messangere to May
And saw wel þᵗat þᵉ shadewe of eủery tre
Was as in lengthe / the same quantitee
Þᵗat was þᵉ body grete þᵗat caused hit
And þ̉erfore by his shadewe he tok wyt
Þat phebus wᵗith þᵗat shone clere ⁊and bryht
Degrees was xlv clomben on height
For þᵗat day is in latitude
Hit is ten on þᵉ clocke he can conclude
And sodeynly he can plyht his hors aboute
Lordynges qd he I warne ȝow al þᵉ route
Þᵉ fourht part of þis day is gon
Now for þᵉ loue of god ⁊and of seint Iohn
Leseth no tyme as forth as ȝe may
Fortyme wasteth bone nyht ⁊and day
And steleth fro vs wᵗith pⁱriue slepynge
And what þoruh necgligence of oure wakynge
As doth þᵉ strem þat tʳneth neuᵉ agayn
Descendynge fro þᵉ montayne in to þᵉ playn
